import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Jwt } from '../services/person'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent { private jwt : Jwt = { value : sessionStorage.getItem('jwt') ?? "" } protected isLogged = false ngOnInit() : void { if(this.jwt.value == "") this.isLogged = false else this.isLogged = true } }
